title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: The bug report lacks sufficient details. Based on the provided information, it seems that there is a discrepancy in the format of datetime values retrieved from a table when displayed in a dynamic text item compared to a data/text item. The expected behavior is for the datetime values to be consistent in both types of items. The bug report does not provide any steps to reproduce the issue.
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be consistently displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
